message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I think you'll love. I'm asking for $10,000 for it. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite ready to go that low.  I'm willing to come down to $9,000, given your interest in the product. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $9,000, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $8,500?

Bob, I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but $8,500 just isn't quite enough for me.  Let's split the difference - how about $9,250?  I'm willing to compromise to make this deal work.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $9,250 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so how about $9,000?
